title: Ingvar Stadheim
text:
Ingvar Stadheim (born 9 February 1951) is a Norwegian <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and former player. His son <a href="Anders%20Stadheim">Anders</a> is also a football player.
Career.
Club career.
Stadheim played for <a href="Sogndal%20Fotball">Sogndal</a>.
Coaching career.
Stadheim managed Norwegian clubs <a href="Sogndal%20Fotball">Sogndal</a> and <a href="Kongsvinger%20IL">Kongsvinger</a>, and later managed the <a href="Norway%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Norwegian under-21 side</a> between 1986 and 1988, and the <a href="Norway%20national%20football%20team">Norwegian national side</a> between 1988 and 1990.
